original_text: “See, I am going to rouse them out of the places to which you sold them, and I will return on your own heads what you have done.
korean_text: 보라 내가 그들을 너희가 팔아 이르게 한 곳에서 일으켜 나오게 하고 너희가 행한 것을 너희 머리에 돌려서

sentences.original_text: See, I am going to rouse them
out of the places to which you sold them
and I will return on your own heads
